as
Phascolosoma pellucidum
; type locality: Saint Thomas , Virgin Islands ( 0.6 m , in debris coral). — Dean 2001: 87 ( Puntarenas , Gulf of Nicoya; Playa Conchal, Brasilito Bay; Sándalo, Golfo Dulce, Costa Rica , intertidal zone, under boulders). Questionable record in the TEP.
